relation: One frat, who I have never seen.
Lots of campus activities, and lots of clubs!
There is a really cool duck pond! Also, lots of student organizations.
I know there ARE dorms. But no one usually lives in them.
Classes aren't very hard at all.
Small class sizes. Teachers are very bright. Overall easy to make a passing grade.
pageTitle: Central Texas College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {224262=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 182443=They do have dorms and it is like $2000 per semester and includes dining., 163784=Ctc offers many opportunities for success in education and every penny will be worth it. Classes for a semester may only cost $1000 and sometimes it is the books that raise the bill, but either way nothing is wasted at Ctc if you put good effort into receiving the knowledge the professors provide for you.}

textAfterTable: The food selection in the Killeen area is awesome! Dorm Life I live at home with my family. Academic Rigor Parking is always difficult. Especially if you live thirty five miles away and you are a stay at home mom. Tips for prospective students Talk with other students to find out the best professors. These relationships will also help you when trying to buy books and studying. In three sentences The online library is phenomenal. The counselors, professors, and secretaries are professional and helpful. The campus is clean. Login to rate or flag the reviews Ronnie from Duncan, OK 05/10/2011 Reviewer is A past student here. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 3 of 61 Categories Comments Bang for the buck
